column3: A Survey on the autonomous exploration of confined subterranean spaces: Perspectives from real-word and industrial robotic deployments.
column4: Héctor Azpúrua; Maíra Saboia da Silva; Gustavo Medeiros Freitas; Lillian Clark; Ali-akbar Agha-mohammadi; Gustavo Pessin; Mario F. M. Campos; Douglas G. Macharet
